# Contributing guidelines

Thank you for your interest in contributing to Life Is A Movie. Please refer to the project issues and discussions to find tasks. When ready, create a branch and submit a pull request.

## Pull requests

### Labels

Label every pull request with the area it impacts:

| Label | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `ios` | Changes to the SwiftUI iOS app |
| `backend` | Changes to the Fastify backend |
| `ci` | Changes to CI/CD workflows |

Additionally, label with the type of change:

| Label | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `bug` | Something isn't working |
| `enhancement` | New feature or improvement |
| `fix` | Patch for a bug |
| `dependency` | Dependency bump or replacement |
| `documentation` | Updates to docs |
| `duplicate` | Duplicate issue or PR |
| `question` | Questionable issue requiring discussion |
| `wontfix` | Will not be worked on |

### Assignees and reviewers

- Assign yourself to the pull request.
- Add the appropriate code owner as a reviewer.

### PR body

Use the pull request template. Every PR should include an issue reference (or N/A), a description, and any additional context.

## Code owners

See [CODEOWNERS](CODEOWNERS) for the current ownership map.
